name: La Quinta Inn & Suites St. Augustine

reviews.text: We opted to stay at this hotel near I-95 as opposed to the hotels in town that are 50% more. The hotel is clean, the staff helpful and friendly. The pool is small but well kept. The breakfast was better than most LQ's. Waffle makers, eggs, sausage, cereals, yogurts, toast and juice/coffee/milk. We saw lots of pets but did nit hear any barking. Will stay again!
reviews.title: Great price, clean and nice breakfast.

reviews.text: It was a typical chain hotel. The rooms were fairly clean. They had a microwave and a refrigerator, which helped with leftovers from restaurants. It was only a ten minute drive into historic St. Augustine. The breakfast was just okay. On weekdays, the only options were cereal, breads, danishes, and waffles. On Saturday, they added eggs and sausage. The staff were super friendly. The shower walls seemed to be retaining water, which could later cause mold.
reviews.title: Decent stay
GREAT STAY
reviews.text: My stay at this hotel was a great experiece. The staff was so nice and the hotel in tip top shape. the breakfast was well presented and full stocked. if something ran out they replaced it immediatly. They also didn't force you out at the turn of 9:00 when it was over they let you finish and take your time and relax. like a vacation should be. Clear pool and great location away from the crowds of downtown.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here on the 3th and 4th of july. Did not know and was not told this hotel alouded pets! They put us in a room on the third floor, had at least 3 dogs barking at night and in the morning! You would think they would put all the pet on the same floor! We will never stay at a La Quinta again!!!!!!!!!!!!!! The manger was not very understanding at all did not care!!!!!!!!!!!!! Please do not stay at these hotels! Also walls very thin can here other rooms tvs on!
reviews.title: barking dogs

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice place to stay while in the St. Augustine area. The only complaint is that the breakfast buffet is too basic. During our trip we stayed in other chains which had breakfast included, and had more items available. I didn't get a rate as good as in my previous stay but it was on Friday, so I suppose that was the reason why. The staff is very friendly; that is a big + for me.
reviews.title: Second time around

reviews.text: The facility was nice and the room was clean. The breakfast choices were good. I had been at a Nursing Home with a dying sister all day. I was tired and ready to relax. The man who registered me was very rude. Every question I had was answered rudely. I guess I just wasn't in the mood. I would recommend this hotel if this man is gone.
reviews.title: Clean Room

reviews.text: We were super pleased with most everything about this hotel! The staff was terrific, the rooms were clean, beds extremely comfy...breakfast was "ok"....I'm personally not a fan of hotel breakfasts but my husband seemed to like it. Pet friendly too so that was super helpful. Was convenient to I-95 and still close to historic St. Augustine. We initially intended to only stay one night but found the city so charming that we stayed a second night. The front desk staff ended up putting us in a different room the second night because we did have some slight noise issues with the AC in the first room. I mentioned it to them in passing and when we came back for the second night, they remembered my comments and placed us in a different room while that AC unit was being checked out. Overall, we were very pleased with our stay and would go back there in a heartbeat!
reviews.title: Really great staff!
Great Stay
reviews.text: We were tired when we arrived.Generally i don't sleep well in hotels. Imagine my surprise when i woke refreshed. The staff was professional and very attentive.I will not hesitate to come back the next time we are in the area.

reviews.title: Old City and Beach vacation
reviews.text: We found LaQuinta again to be the best value out there. My wife and I chose to stay at this location due to its close proximity to St Augustine and the Old City. We enjoyed very much the city tours that picked us up at the hotel and brought us back when we were ready to come back. The hotel staff were very courteous and helpful in assisting us to plan our stay by giving great advice and information on where to go and the best way to enjoy our visit. We were directed to shopping, historical sites and even the favorite local beach spots with easy parking. We could not have been happier at this LaQuinta and would recommend it strongly.

Stayed at this hotel becase we we were looking for a place convenient to 95 and reasonably priced for a two night stay on our way to the Keys from Baltimore. The hotel was not fancy but was clean and the boys enjoyed the pool. The staff was very accomodating and helpful each time we made a request. Only complaint came from my 15 year old who said the sofabed was uncomfortable because he could feel the springs so he opted for the floor the second night. I would stay here again if looking for reasonably priced accomodations.
reviews.title: Clean room, helpful staff for a reasonable price.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was the 2nd La Quinta Inn we stayed at on our trip to the Florida Keys. It was very easy to get to off the Highway(even with a lot of road construction) When we arrived the co-owner was there with a new employee. She was very pleasant did a very good job checking us in. The room was very clean. We arrived around 8:00 pm and was looking for a place to eat. They recommended a very good place to eat. The pool was clean and very pleasant. I used the work out room the next morning. It was very small and only 1 treadmill and bike with some lifting equipment. I found when staying at Hotels this is the norm. We would stay there again if we ever go there.
reviews.title: Very Clean

reviews.text: Hotel itself is very nice. Room was acceptable and everything in the room worked properly.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: Very close to downtown and attractions. Hotel is next to a section of the outlet mall. Did not have any problems finding it off the I-95.
reviews.title: Extremely impressed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Only one disappointment, Janine(?),at the front desk needs to lose the attitude.(From check in to questions about the area).
reviews.title: Close to St Augustine

reviews.text: We needed a hotel that catered to my handicap mother and this LaQuinta did the job!!!! The staff was wonderful, the room was clean...We stayed in their hotel as we traveled south Fla..it was so nice on our way back north we booked the same place and got the same room...The staff made sure my moms stay was comfortable.The handicap room was hugh...Breakfast hit the spot...I will stay in a LaQuinta Inn again...I recommend this place!!!!!!
reviews.title: Wonderful
On my way to Ft Lauderdale
reviews.text: It was very clean. The staff was courteous. It seemed to be a very safe area and is conveniently located between 2 outlet malls, a lot of restaurants and easy, quick access to the historic area of St Augustine.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room is attractive, staff is very friendly, great shower, but we could hear our neighbours TV untill late, the steps of our neighbours above us on the 3rd floor, hickups of the alarm, loud refrigerator, so despite the comfortable bed we slept badly. Limited breakfast choice, this looks typical for La Quinta. Hotel is located near to outlet malls, but quite a distance away from the historic center.
reviews.title: Pleasant room, but rather noisy
Great!!!
reviews.text: The only complaint I have about the hotel was the paint was cracking. That's it! Everything was wonderful! I am gonna have to call them back just to find out where they got that comfy bed!!!!!!!!! We slept like babies! Even the pups wouldn't get off it!!! Thanks La Quinta!!!

The facility was smaller than other LaQuintas we've stay but just as comfortable. Friendly and helpful staff. Rooms were typical and clean. Rooms are accessible from lobby rather than outside...which I prefer.
reviews.title: Great staff

aka: La Quinta Inn & Suites St. Augustine Hotel Saint Augustine
description: With easy access to I-95 and both outlet malls this 60 room interior corridor La Quinta Inn & Suites is 100% smoke free and pet friendly. Our Spacious comfortable rooms come with free high-speed internet, microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker and hair dryer. Take a dip in our outdoor Pool and Heated Jacuzzi or take advantage of our fitness and business centers.As of 2012 we have new management and staff that look forward to seeing you!
